title: I Need Boundaries w/ My Guilt-Tripping Mother-in-Law
description:
In today’s show, we’re talking to a woman burdened by her mother-in-law’s guilt trips and a firefighter-in training wondering how to mentally prepare for the trauma of the job. And we have special guest Rachel Cruze joining us to discuss why people (like her) fall for conspiracy theories.
  https://peterattiamd.com/conspiracy-theory-theories-july-20-1969/
 Lyrics of the Day: "Truth" - New Order
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp

  Resources:
  Own Your Past, Change Your Future
